name: IsLanding
description:
Jumping between cubes on the sea of an alien planet with a jetpack!

Press "Spacebar" to fly vertically

Press "↑" to fly horizontally

Press "S" to change orientation

Press "R" to restart the game

Jetpack on both horizontal and vertical direction can only be used once at a time (i.e. you can't use it again if the key is up, unless you land on another cube)
